original_text:
then you will find your joy in the Lord,
    and I will cause you to ride in triumph on the heights of the land
    and to feast on the inheritance of your father Jacob.”
For the mouth of the Lord has spoken.
korean_text: 네가 여호와 안에서 즐거움을 얻을 것이라 내가 너를 땅의 높은 곳에 올리고 네 조상 야곱의 기업으로 기르리라 여호와의 입의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: then you will find your joy in the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 주 안에서 너의 기쁨을 찾을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and I will cause you to ride in triumph
on the heights of the land
and to feast on the inheritance
For the mouth of the Lord has spoken
